claims.object: Ratio of area moment of inertia to the distance from the neutral axis to the extreme fiber

surface_layer.definition: A geometric property of a cross-section used in the design of beams and columns.
common_uses: Determining the load-carrying capacity of a beam

deep_layer.mechanism: Relates bending moment to bending stress in a structural member.
deep_layer.origin: Calculated from the area moment of inertia and the distance to the extreme fiber.

examples: 0.068 in^3 for a 1-inch nominal diameter schedule 40 steel tube

citations: ASTM Steel Tube Pipe Section Properties - Engineers Edge
